knimeNode.name: XES Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node imports an event log from disk.

fullDescription.intro: This node imports a XES event log from the local file. The output is shown in a graphical view.
fullDescription.option:
The method to read an event log. There are two methods available:
OPEN NAIVE:
Open XES standard reading method. Only XES Standard extensions can be read from the xml file.
IEEE Lenient:
IEEE XES can read a lenient IEEE XES log from a plain XML serialization.
The location of the event log
